pullrequest.title: Add support for loading wavefront obj mesh files

content.raw:
turns out obj assigns a material for each face in the mesh but gazebo assigns materials on the submesh level so I updated the code to create a new gazebo submesh per unique material. 574a917

The textures in the cloverleave interchange model should load properly now.
